title: Knife River Indian Villages National Historic Site: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Special Use Permits Certain types of activities require special use permits. These include many types of organized gatherings, distribution of printed material or other public expressions of opinion, and other activities that are controlled or prohibited. For more information on Special Use Permits please contact the park at (701) 745-3300
